original_text: When anyone starts to rule as king, he must copy this Law of God on a scroll. The scroll will be a copy of the one that belongs to the Levite priests.
korean_text: 그가 왕위에 오르거든 이 율법서의 등사본을 레위 사람 제사장 앞에서 책에 기록하여

sentences.original_text: When anyone starts to rule as king
he must copy this Law of God on a scroll
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이 하나님의 율법을 두루마리에 베껴 써야 한다

sentences.original_text: The scroll will be a copy
of the one that belongs to the Levite priests
